id: A Stoic Notion: The Prompted Digital Journal
name: A Stoic Notion: The Prompted Digital Journal
description: A digital daily journal built entirely in Notion. Inspired by the Stoics and other contemporary journaling approaches. This template helps you collect, connect and organise your thoughts with quick capture, calendar view, content tags and prompted templates. 14 prompted entry templates are filled with prompts and provocations to help you reflect and grow in guided writing. Customise & update as you wish!Using it: All you need to use it is a Notion account (free for life). A set-up guide and
